name: Color Runner (Vukbo)
description:
This Game is a local 2 Player Versus Game where you color the ground with your blob. Goal is it to have more colored fields than your friend. 

Controls
PLAYER 1
W,A,S,D to move the Blob

PLAYER 2
UP-, DOWN-, LEFT-, RIGHT-Arrow Keys to move the Blob

Tools Used:
- Godot 3.2 (Game Engine) [I love it <3]
- Affinity Designer & Photo (Sprites and Media)
- Garage Band (Sounds)
